story.storykicker: Check out what the stars say your day will be like today.
story.storybody:
ARIES{mosimage}

You respond quickly to new ideas but find it hard to sustain interest. Beware of external influences that can sway your resolve for a professional move. Parents, friends and close relationships are caring and supportive. Meditate to gain balance and centering. Lucky number 8. Colour blue.

TAURUS{mosimage}

You triumph in a competitive situation and gain financially today. A frank talk with your partner clears up misunderstandings. Expressing true feelings to a loved one brings back the magic in your romantic relationship. You recover quickly from sickness. Lucky number 19. Colour yellow.

GEMINI{mosimage}

Like 'The Princess of Wands' you have the tiger by the tail and control relationships and projects today. You are bold and dynamic and stick your neck out for friends and associates to demand justice. You invite loyalty and friendship by giving real support. Lucky number 15. Colour magenta.

CANCER{mosimage}

Beware of duality and supporting contradictory opinions or you end up slaying as fast as you create. Allow your heart to lead the way in relationships and deep friendships. You may have to take sides in a conflict, remain on neutral ground as far as possible. Lucky number 18. Colour blue.

LEO{mosimage}

As your plans and ideas actualize you gain credibility and success. A lot of movement is on the cards as you are multi faceted and have much to achieve in different aspects. New opportunities lead to positive changes. Listen to your intuition for the right answers. Lucky number 7. Colour blue.

VIRGO{mosimage}

Triangular relationships can be problematic but three-way business collaborations can be gainful. There is good luck attending material affairs, as there is increase of wealth and income. You combine good luck with good management to achieve success and gain. Lucky number 9. Colour pink.

LIBRA{mosimage}

You tend to be lazy today. You are likely to take a journey and pay wandering visits to friends. Health food and fitness diets are in again. Let go completed jobs and relationships that you were identified with as new dimensions are waiting to be discovered. Lucky number 8. Colour white.

SCORPIO{mosimage}

You extend hospitality and celebrate life in your inimitable style. Visitors and news can be expected from overseas. Professional matters and business arrangements are satisfactory. New people and developments bring fresh energy. Watch finances and health. Lucky number 3. Colour red.

SAGITTARIUS{mosimage}

Financial stability allows you to get on with ambitious business projects and ventures. Investment in land or home is gainful. Your personal relationship is secure and wonderful. Your daily routines may be regular and fixed but that's just what you need now. Lucky number 4. Colour red.

CAPRICORN{mosimage}

You make compromises in relationships and resolve conflicts at work today! Intellectual battles and clashes come to a conclusion and harmony is restored. This is a time of relaxation after a period of anxiety and mental chaos. You recover from any illness. Lucky number 4. Colour green.

AQUARIUS{mosimage}

Mental conflicts finally lead to compromise and peace after a period of struggle today. Harmony at home and love in relationships is reassuring. You may find it difficult to take a professional decision right now so wait for clarity. Take care of your health. Lucky number 2. Colour green.

PISCES{mosimage}

Approach difficult people and tasks with a positive attitude! You need to keep an eye on balance in all aspects of life. You are moody and sometimes intense. Beware of restricting loved ones due to your own insecurity. Allowing freedom brings them closer. Lucky number 15. Colour browns.
